Welcome to Average of Squares's documentation!
==============================================
This software calculates the weighted average of squares of numbers, given a list of numbers and a list of weights for each number.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
   
   content/average-squares-docs.rst
